display_long_description:
Welcome to **Trivia Crack World Legacy, the first immersive trivia experience** on Meta Quest! Join Willy, your friendly host, and his six friends who are experts in different fields: Tina (art), Héctor (history), Pop (entertainment), Bonzo (sports), Albert (science), and Tito (geography). They will challenge you with **thousands of questions** that will test your knowledge. In the park, you can meet them, interact with them, and take photos.

**Explore the park** freely and participate in Trivia Tower games, where you'll compete to **become the season champion** and have your own statue in the park. **Meet players from around the world**, learn by playing trivia, and make new friends while **showcasing your skills** in activities like drawing, fishing, and more.


Visit all the **park attractions**, such as Héctor's Museum, where you can test your history knowledge and earn key fragments for prizes. If you prefer a more personalized experience, **create private games** and have fun with friends. For those who enjoy playing solo, **Solo Mode** lets you maintain your winning streak by correctly answering mini-games that challenge both your knowledge and skills.


At the Trivia Panel, surrounded by other park visitors, answer a series of trivia questions while Willy helps you learn more. Plus, Trivia Crack World Legacy is **multiplatform**, allowing you to play from anywhere. Join the fun in Trivia Crack World, where learning and fun never end!
